fullplot: Lotte is a soldier recently back from war. She drinks, and her apartment is a mess. When her father comes to see her he offers her a job. He turns out to make his living by offering the services of African prostitutes to those who want to buy. Lotte starts driving his girlfriend and main attraction Lily around town for house calls. Lotte determines that Lily needs her help.
plot: A soldier returning from war is hired by her own father to drive his prostitutes around town. She calls upon herself to help one of them.
title: Little Soldier
